wikipedia_page.main: Harold McKee is an Ulster Unionist Party politician from Northern Ireland. He served as an MLA for South Down from the 2016 election until 2017. He was a member of the Committee for Agriculture, Environment and Rural Affairs. He tabled 297 questions in the 2016–2017 term.

response: In October 2021, Newry and Mourne UUP councillor Harold McKee resigned from the party because of Beattie's promotion of 'liberal values'.
